cons: Stay on the safe side and avoid using chive in large amount if you are pregnant or breast-feeding.
Taking too much chive can cause an upset stomach.
description: Chives helps to decrease overall risk of coronary artery disease (CAD), peripheral vascular diseases (PVD), and stroke.
Chives contain choline. Choline is an important nutrient that helps with sleep, muscle movement, learning and memory.
It also helps to maintain the structure of cellular membranes, aids in the transmission of nerve impulses, assists in the absorption of fat and reduces chronic inflammation.
It helps to maintain bone integrity and density.
